verses.name: Revelation 9:7
verses.text: And the shapes of the locusts were like unto horses prepared unto battle; and on their heads were as it were crowns like gold, and their faces were as the faces of men.

verses.name: Revelation 9:8
verses.text: And they had hair as the hair of women, and their teeth were as the teeth of lions.

verses.name: Revelation 9:9
verses.text: And they had breastplates, as it were breastplates of iron; and the sound of their wings was as the sound of chariots of many horses running to battle.
